name: Black Guard Drake
languages: understands Draconic but can't speak it

special_abilities.name: Amphibious.
descriptions: The guard drake can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The drake attacks twice, once with its bite and once with its tail.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) bludgeoning damage.
